description: Learn how to troubleshoot and repair a noisy dishwasher by the type of noise it makes, from the rattle of a pump housing or motor bushings, to a worn washer arm bearing.
parts: Pump, Wash Arm Bearing Ring & Spray Arm Seal, Spray Arms

description: Diagnose the reason for your leaking dishwasher, from a worn pump and door seals, to a failed water inlet valve.
parts: Pump, Door Gasket, Water Inlet Valve, Dispensers & Grommets, Spray Arm, Float & Float Switch, Hose Clamps & Hoses

description: Learn how to fix a dishwasher that will not start, by checking a few key components, such as door latch switches, timers, electronic controls, motor relays and thermal fuses.
parts: Door Latch Or Door Latch Switch, Timer Or Electronic Control, Selector Switch, Motor Start Relay, Thermal Fuse, Drive Motor

description: Find out how to fix a dishwasher door latch that isn't working properly by troubleshooting common repair parts like the door latch kit.
parts: Door Latch Assembly

description: Determine why your dishwasher will not clean properly by troubleshooting parts, like housing gaskets, spray arms, water deliver tubes and filters.
parts: Upper Discharge Housing Gasket, Spray Arm, Docking Station, Chopper, Water Inlet Valve, Water Delivery Tube, Filters, Wash Spinner, Detergent Dispenser, Heating Element, Pump Impellers

description: Figure out why your dishwasher will not drain by learning how to test a drain pump motor, timer and drain hose.
parts: Piston & Nut Assembly, Drain Pump & Motor, Check Valve Flapper, Belt, Timer, Drain Hose

description: Diagnose why your dishwasher will not fill with water by checking and testing a water inlet valve, float switch and door switch.
parts: Water Inlet Valve, Float, Float Switch, Door Switch

description: Learn how to repair a dishwasher that will not dispense detergent by testing the bi-metal release, wax motor and timer.
parts: Detergent & Rinse Aid Dispensers, Rinse Aid Cap, Door Spring & Hinge Pin, Wax Motor, Bi-Metal Release, Timer

description: Find out how to troubleshoot and repair a dishwasher that will not properly dry dishes, by checking heating elements, high limit thermostats and rinse aid dispensers.
parts: Heating Element, High Limit Thermostat, Rinse Aid Dispenser

description: When your fridge is noisy, find out how to repair it by troubleshooting the location of the noise, from the evaporator fan motor in the freezer to the bottom of the fridge with the condenser fan motor.
parts: Condenser Fan Motor, Evaporator Fan Motor, Evaporator Fan Motor Grommet

description: Diagnose the reason for your leaking fridge, from a faulty water inlet valve to a worn out door seal.
parts: Door Gaskets Or Seals, Water Inlet Valve, Ice Maker Assembly

description: Find out how to fix a fridge that will not start, by examining a few key parts such as the temperature control or the compressor overload relay.
parts: Overload Or Relay-Start Capacitor, Cold Control & Temperature Control, Electronic Control Board

description: Learn how to fix your ice maker when it's not making ice and inspect the water fill tubes, water inlet valve and the icemaker.
parts: Water Fill Tubes, Water Inlet Valve, Ice & Water Filter, Ice Maker Assembly & Replacement Ice Maker

description: If your fridge is, too warm then troubleshooting common parts like the air inlet damper.
parts: Air Inlet Damper Or Baffle

description: If the water dispenser is not dispensing water then examine key parts such as the water inlet valve and dispenser actuator.
parts: Ice & Water Filter, Water Inlet Valve, Water Dispenser Actuator, Micro Switch, Dispenser Control Board

symptom: Fridge and Freezer are too warm
description: Diagnose the causes of why the fridge and freezer are too warm by checking a few key parts such as the defrost timer, defrost heater, defrost thermostat or evaporator fan motor.
parts: Cold Control Or Temperature Control, Evaporator Fan Motor, Electronic Control Board, Temperature Sensor Or Thermistor, Defrost Timer, Defrost Thermostat, Defrost Heater, Condenser Fan Motor

description: When the fridge has doors that are sweating then examine key components such as the door gasket, seals and the hinges.
parts: Fresh Food & Freezer Door Gasket, Dispenser Door Assembly or Flapper & Ice Door Kit, Door Closure Cam Kit, Door Hinge & Bearing

description: Learn how to fix the fridge when the light won't turn on but the door is opened.
parts: Light Bulb Or Lamp, Light Sockets, Door Light Switch, Light Bulb & Ice Dispenser

description: Find out how to repair a fridge that's too cold by troubleshooting the common problem parts like a temperature control or thermistor.
parts: Air Inlet Damper Or Baffle, Temperature Sensor Or Thermistor, Main Control Board, Cold Control Or Temperature Control

description: Troubleshoot why the fridge is running too long by examining some of the key parts like a faulty defrost timer or the thermostats.
parts: Defrost Timer, Defrost Heater, Defrost Termination Thermostat, Fresh & Freezer Door Gaskets, Condenser Fan Motor, Evaporator Fan Motor, Sealed System

description: Determine why your freezer is too cold by troubleshooting parts, like the air damper or thermistor.
parts: Air Damper Or Freezer Control, Temperature Sensor Or Thermistor
